item.title: AeriCam VPX-GPS Stabilized --For Pro Aerial Photography
RC HeliCam--AeriCam 3 axis with Canon t2i-Raw, no stabilization
Aericam VPX Flying at Yankee Stadium
item.description:
Our customer flying the very first AeriCam VPX at Yankee Stadium for a high profile commercial with a 8.5lb SI-2k Mini camera. Thus, he have successfully flown with the Sony EX1, Panasonic HPX 170 and the SI-2k Mini with very positive flying balance.

Find out more about the AeriCam VPX at our AeriCam webisite.
item.menuDescription:
Our customer flying the very first AeriCam VPX at Yankee Stadium for a high profile commercial with a 8.5lb SI-2k Mini camera. Thus, he have successfully flown with the Sony EX1, Panasonic HPX 170 and the SI-2k Mini with very positive flying balance.
Find out more about the AeriCam VPX at our AeriCam webisite.

item.title: 3 Axis Gyro Stabilize Camera Mount---AeriCam
item.description: Light weight 3 axis gyro stabilized camera mount remotely controlled, designed for RC Helicopter for aerial photography. Also for applications such as RC Blimp Aerial Photography, Jibs, car mounts, Cable Cam and much more.
item.menuDescription: Light weight 3 axis gyro stabilized camera mount remotely controlled, designed for RC Helicopter for aerial photography. Also for applications such as RC Blimp Aerial Photography, Jibs, car mounts, Cable Cam and much more.

item.title: New York Aerial Photography - Coney Island
item.description: Aerial View of New York City's Famous Coney Island. Since it's will be replace by new developments, it's the last change to get some aerial video of the place.
item.menuDescription: Aerial View of New York City's Famous Coney Island. Since it's will be replace by new developments, it's the last change to get some aerial video of the place.
